attributes.magic: ASCII text, with very long lines (63963u), with CRLF line terminators

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

match_context.values:
@{ScriptBlockText=#PowerLadon
function Ladon
{
<#
.SYNOPSIS

This script leverages Ladon 8.0 and Reflection.Assembly to reflectively load Ladon completely in memory. This allows you to do things such as
dump credentials without ever writing the Ladon binary to disk. 

Required Dependencies: Ladon (included)
Optional Dependencies: None
Ladon version: 8.0 (20210206)

.DESCRIPTION

Reflectively loads Ladon 8.0 in memory using PowerShell. Can be used to scan network without writing anything to disk. Ca [TRUNCATED]; Path=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\sample.ps1; ScriptBlockId=01623fb7-050a-4861-8803-c675edf399b1; MessageTotal=222; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=#PowerLadon

{

Required Dependencies: Ladon (included)

Ladon version: 8.0 (20210206)

.DESCRIPTION

Reflectively loads Ladon 8.0 in memory using PowerShell. Can be used to scan network without writing anything to disk. Ca [TRUNCATED]; Path=C:\Users\george\Desktop\script.ps1; ScriptBlockId=a9aa46e5-9c81-4c90-8a61-5819fa3b7b03; MessageTotal=239; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of "Reflection.Assembly" load functions to dynamically load assemblies in memory
Detects potentially suspicious keywords that could indicate the use of a PowerShell exploitation framework
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Perez Diego (@darkquassar), Tuan Le (NCSGroup)

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.
